Name: Ann
About the game: 'This game is my love letter & homage to the golden age of Horror RPG-maker games in 2012. And just like those old RPG-maker games this game features chase scenes and some death puzzles, if you die, try and try again! Good luck!' -Rong Rong ==================================================================================== ==================================================================================== Ann, an art student finds herself trapped in the school when she accidentally broke one of the school's rules. With the help of the school's security guard, help Ann navigate her way out and uncover the secrets of the school before she becomes a permanent resident of the school. Gameplay Features: - Fully animated cutscenes. - Multiple endings. - Autosave feature. - Steam Achievements. ======================================== - If you have finished the game and want to support the developer, check out the Digital Artbook DLC! -Why is the game free? 'I want everyone to enjoy the game just like how they enjoyed the classic RPG maker horror games, as a freeware that everyone can just pick up and play after a long exhausting day of school/work, that's how I was introduced to Ib, Ao Oni, Mad Father and other great RPG maker horror games back then. I just want to bring back the spirit of the old classic 2012 where RPG maker horror games were booming, y'know'. - Jason 'Rong Rong' H.
